column.name: data_type
column.text: 表单分类： 1=节点表单 2=全局表单

column.name: form_type
column.text: 表单类型: 0=在线表单 1=URL表单,注：在线表单,为系统自定义表单;url表单,是外部表单。地址写法规则为：如果表单页面平台在同一个应用中，路径从根开始写，不需要上下文路径，例如 ：/form/addUser.do。 如果需要使用的表单不再同一个应用下，则需要写完整路径如:http://xxx/crm/addUser.do

column.name: form_url
column.text: 当表单类型=1时：表单URL值, (表单编辑url)

column.name: form_detail_url
column.text: 当表单类型=1时: 明细URL值

statements.statement:
select * from ext_node_form where 1=1 <#if query??> <#if query.key??> <#assign key = StringUtil.escapeSql(query.key)/> and ( definition_id = '%${key}%' or task_key like '%${key}%' or task_name like '%${key}%' or form_name like '%${key}%' or form_code = '%${key}%' or form_url like '%${key}%' or form_detail_url like '%${key}%' or app_code = '%${key}%' or remark like '%${key}%' ) </#if>
<#if query.ids??> and id in (${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.ids)}) </#if>
<#if query.id??> and id = ${query.id} </#if>
<#if query.dataType??> and data_type = ${query.dataType} </#if>
<#if query.definitionId??> and definition_id = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.definitionId)}' </#if>
<#if query.definitionIdList??> <#if (query.definitionIdList?size > 0)> and definition_id in ( <#list query.definitionIdList as definitionId> '${StringUtil.escapeSql(definitionId)}' <#if definitionId_has_next>,</#if> </#list> ) </#if> </#if>
<#if query.taskKey??> and task_key = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.taskKey)}' </#if>
<#if query.taskName??> and task_name = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.taskName)}' </#if>
<#if query.formName??> and form_name = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.formName)}' </#if>
<#if query.formCode??> and form_code = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.formCode)}' </#if>
<#if query.formType??> and form_type = ${query.formType} </#if>
<#if query.formUrl??> and form_url = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.formUrl)}' </#if>
<#if query.formDetailUrl??> and form_detail_url = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.formDetailUrl)}' </#if>
<#if query.appCode??> and app_code = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.appCode)}' </#if>
<#if query.sn??> and sn = ${query.sn} </#if>
<#if query.remark??> and remark = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.remark)}' </#if>
<#if query.createTimeBegin?? && query.createTimeEnd??> and date_format(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') between '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.createTimeBegin)}' and '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.createTimeEnd)}' </#if> </#if>
